about_the_game:
Theme Song Lyrics

[Verse1)
In a world lost in time, where danger awaitsA hero must rise, to save
With a heart of steel, and a fearless mind
Omega Mouse, he's the one of a kind

[Verse 2]
Through the starry sky, he'll navigate
Fighting aliens and their wicked ways
With lasers blazing, and a fearless roar
Omega Mouse, he's gonna even the score

[Chorus]
Omega Mouse, he's a hero in disguise
With a mission to save, where the future lies
In the darkest of nights, he'll light up the skies
Omega Mouse, he's the champion we idolize

name: Omega Mouse Zero Soundtrack
short_description: Listen the sounds of the Omega-Verse. From the melodies of the Mystic caves, to the epic orchestra of dark sorcerer's, the Omega Mouse Zero Soundtrack has 10 songs that range from rock and suspense to calm melody, taking the listener on an emotional rollercoaster of hype and wonder.
